effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
